oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bloody Pond Chickamauga Battlefield
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brown-toned photograph of Bloody Pond located within Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park. The image is surrounded by a decorative frame and border. Although "Chattanooga, Tenn." is printed on the front of the postcard, Bloody Pond is located off of Plaster Drive in Georgia. Features an undivided back and handwritten correspondence on both sides. December 29 and December 30, 1905 postmarks. [No. 520]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga Battlefield (Ga.); Fort Oglethorpe (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves
